name: Shovel Diggers!
description:
Made for the Mini Jame Gam #15, the theme being together, and the special object being a shovel!

You and yourself must work together in order to find the missing map pieces that leads to the legendary golden shovel!

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Movement
Space - Place Bomb
M - Mute

Credits: Created by Moonsoft Studios
Developed by Innocent Traitor | James Moffett
BGM: Keido Hona - Lo-Fi Chat via DOVA-SYNDROME
Art Assets: Kenney (Mostly), Igor Gundarev (Clouds)

Join my Discord for new projects! discord.gg/cM5ZuvSSQT
